Description: distanceValue' needs to be 'distanceExpression' in lines like "d1=distanceValue" but in lines like "d1=d1+distanceValue" leave it as 'distanceValue'
Comments: Basically, any time the distance can become an expression (ie. d1+5), it should be distanceExpression. Otherwise it should be distanceValue (ie. d1=d1+distanceValue)
